text_block_list.text: The day after signing a contract with Mejiro Ramonu. I was so ecstatic that I had forgot to exchange contact information with her, so I went looking for her.
choice_data_list: (I want to discuss what comes next!)

text_block_list.text: The dream I wanted to pursue with her just wouldn't leave my mind. That race, and that race……I tried to suppress my excitement as I went around searching――
――Or at least I tried……for some reason, I couldn't find her at all. And that continued on in to the next day……
And the next day――
And the next――
Maybe it was just a twist of fate, but I couldn't find Mejiro Ramonu at all. It was a day off, but I entered the gym thinking she was training but――as expected, she wasn't here.
Excuse me……are you looking for my older sister?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I'm Mejiro Ardan. Nee-sama――……Mejiro Ramonu's little sister.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: You're my older sister's trainer, right? I've heard about it from the people at home.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: If you're looking for my older sister, then I might have an idea where she is. Around this time……I'm almost certain.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: O-of course. ……But…… would it be alright for me to go with you?
The place that Mejiro Ardan took me was――the race track. The entire venue was filled with excitement for today's Main Race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: No, Nee-sama always likes to pick a spot close to the turf. Most likely, right around……Ah.
I hesitated to speak to her since she was staring so intently out at the turf…… Then, the fanfare to signal the beginning of the race rang out.
From the start, she concentrated on the race, never turning her eyes away……It was like she was completely absorbed in to the world of racing.
Her cheeks were flushed and her eyes were sparkling as she looked out on the turf. There was none of the intimidating aura or presence from before, it was almost like――
The cheers grew even louder. As the race entered the final straight, the competition grew more intense. I was drawn in instantly, before I realized it――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ――So you like it.
I was soaking it all in while looking at the goal board…… Mejiro Ramonu had suddenly spoken, probably to herself.
choice_data_list: You must really like races too
You must really like races too

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: No.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: I love them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Aah, after all……isn't that right? How it sets your heart aflame, so intensely……The heat. The ache. The joy……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: The one thing……that drives me. Only races――My love.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Preparing for those days, with a perfect arrangement……Uma Musume who pour their all in to their running. The sound of feet digging in to the ground, reverberating through the soul――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: The frantic breath all around, an intensity palpable to the skin, the sound of a beating heart. The overwhelming cheers coming from across the fence. Shouting, expectations, excitement……――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Using only your own body to compete, seeking the glory of victory…… All of it, is absolutely irresistible.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: And what is born from that, is a gem of a race…… Offerring up such a perfect, complete victory……is proof of my love.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: In addition to that――that means the Triple Tiara, doesn't it?
I reacted involuntarily. She was also aiming for the Triple Tiara…… It seems like my intuition at the time was not wrong.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: …… And so……Ardan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Who is this? Yours?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: N-nee-sama……they're your trainer. You formed a contract, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……Aah. You, are the preparations for a debut coming along?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Not necessary. Just take care of the preparations, please.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Ah, Nee-sama……! ……Um, Trainer-san.
It was quite a shock that I had been forgotten…… But like this, I understood her love of races and her dream. These were the first steps to building trust.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……Um. Would it be alright to ask you something? Trainer-san, what happened that led to you forming a contract with my older sister?
After watching her race, I immediately went chasing after her. She told me that I was the first so she signed……that's what I explained.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……As I thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Truthfully……Trainer-san isn't the first one to ask. The people that formed a contract with my sister――
